summary: American soldier, obviously very skilled in martial arts, single-handedly takes on mercenaries in the Philippines.
cast: Michael Dudikoff|Steve James|Judie Aronson|Guich Koock|John Fujioka|Don Stewart|John LaMotta|Tadashi Yamashita|Phillip Brock|Tony Carreon|Roi Vinzon|Manolet Escudero|Greg Rocero|Berto Spoor|Michael Hackbart|Jerry Bailey|Rohy Batliwala|Jim Gaines|Steve Cook|Brian Robilliard|Zenon Gil|Willie Williams|Christian Hoss|Joey Galvez|Nick Nicholson|Eric Hahn|Edouard Spyk Gheur|Richard Norton|Henry Strzalkowski
title: El guerrero americano
